General.Name: Avant Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Avant Technologies Inc. develops, acquires, and creates artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. The company publishes Thy News application for processing news from various sources. It also provides information technology (IT) consulting services, including project management and software administration, financial and asset management, service management, and event management. The company was formerly known as Trend Innovations Holding Inc. and changed its name to Avant Technologies Inc. in July 2023. Avant Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.
